Brain Blog

Brain-Behavior Articles and Insights

Writings about neuropsychology, neuroscience, and mental health

Categories
All (3)
ADHD (1)
Brain Development (3)
Neuropsychology (1)

“Our intuitions are only accurate in domains where we have a lot of experience.”
- AG

Welcome to my neuropsychology blog, a dedicated space where I will explore the intricacies of pediatric and developmental neuropsychology, adult neuropsychology, and delve into the complexities of ADHD, OCD, autism, learning disorders, and other neurodevelopmental and neuropsychiatric disorders across the lifespan.

I’ll talk about the fascinating world of the developing brain, understanding how it shapes behavior, learning, and emotion. And about the things I know best. My focus lies in untangling the nuances of clinical developmental neuropsychology – a field that not only offers insights into the growing mind but also provides critical information for early intervention and support.
